title: Associate, Tax
content:
Airbnb was born in 2007 when two Hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 4 million Hosts who have welcomed more than 1 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, Hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.The Community You Will Join 
Airbnb Capability Center (formerly known as Airseva) was set up in 2017 in Gurgaon. We provide specialized operational services which allow Airbnb's business and responsibilities across the world. These include Finance Technology, Finance Shared Services, Analytics, Engineering, amongst other verticals. Our offices are home to multi-experienced teams with an understanding of our business and community. We're hospitable, fun and we welcome all with open arms. 
The difference you will make 
As an Airbnb Finance team member, the Tax Associate will have broad exposure to various financial systems and processes and will support critical goals and deadlines. The ideal candidate for this position will have strong attention to detail as well as strong time management and the ability to confidently support processes within the organization. In addition, the ideal candidate will have an understanding of Direct Tax and the ability to work in a fast paced environment. This position would be reporting into the ACC Associate Principal position. 
A typical day 

Working with local tax service providers to compile direct tax (corporate tax) compliance data files from our financial reporting systems, responding to queries and reviewing direct tax filings for accuracy.
Working with local service providers and/or internal teams to prepare and review Digital Services Tax compliance data files in line with BEPS Pillar 2 effort.
Sending and tracking wires to international jurisdictions for periodic direct tax and digital services tax payments (advance payments and balancing payments).
Preparation of tax provisions to ensure the financial statements accurately reflect the accounting for corporate income taxes, deferred taxes, and digital services taxes.
Reconciliation of direct tax and digital services tax collection and payments.
Working with local service provider and/or internal teams to prepare and review India GST compliances
Sending and tracking India GST payments
Reconciliation of indirect tax payments and tax credits
Liaising with local service providing for filing and release of GST refunds from tax authorities 
Providing audit support by compiling data files and providing summaries for direct and indirect taxes.
Receiving requests for reports from jurisdictions, responding to requests, and providing reports. 
Completing ad hoc projects as assigned.
Identifying, designing and implementing process improvements.

Your Expertise 

Strong Direct Tax and GST experience
Bachelor's degree with an emphasis in accounting, economics or related finance field (CPA or an advanced degree in tax is highly desirable)
Strong organization skills and meticulous attention to detail
Analytical and has a strong excel/spreadsheet background 
Ability to maintain a high level of accuracy in performing all essential duties 
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Highly motivated and results driven 
Proven ability to succeed in both collaborative and independent work environments
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment 
Must be passionate about Airbnbâ€™s mission

Our commitment to inclusion & belonging 
Airbnb is committed to working with the broadest talent pool possible. We believe diverse ideas foster innovation and engagement, and allow us to attract creatively-led people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. All qualified individuals are encouraged to apply. If you need assistance, or a reasonable accommodation during the application and recruiting process, please contact us at: reasonableaccommodations@airbnb.com.
